text: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

translation.en: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief]
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah Kami binasakan negeri-negeri di sekitarmu, dan juga telah Kami jelaskan berulang-ulang tanda-tanda (kebesaran Kami), agar mereka kembali (bertobat)
